wiki.summary: “Here With Me” is about wanting to spend your life with someone you love whilst doing everything you can to keep them them around. It sheds light on the subject of spending time apart and it works as a comfort song because the main point through the song is that the person you love is there with you. It gained over 90,000 thousand On Tik Tok and on 56,000 thousand SoundCloud within the first few weeks. It is also one of d4vd’s most popular songs of all time, with it having over 30 Million across all platforms as of November 2022. Read more on Last.fm.
